validation_rules: vri01_wetland_validation(inventory_standard_cd, species_cd_1, species_pct_1, species_cd_2, non_productive_descriptor_cd, non_forest_descriptor, land_cover_class_cd_1, soil_moisture_regime_1, crown_closure, proj_height_1 | NOT_APPLICABLE)

description: Concatenates five attributes to create CAS_ID

translation_rules: vri01_wetland_translation(inventory_standard_cd, species_cd_1, species_pct_1, species_cd_2, non_productive_descriptor_cd, non_forest_descriptor, land_cover_class_cd_1, soil_moisture_regime_1, crown_closure, proj_height_1, 1)
description: No validation required because the row_translation_rule has already validated that a wetland code exists. Translation converts source attributes into 4-character wetland code and returns the code corresponding to the first character.
